特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
Instruction and activities will be completed in English only.
We will be exploring and researching current issues that have great impact on our world. Although the course is unified, in a typical week, one day may be basically a seminar and pair-work format; another day may often focus on presentation and discussion skills; and the third day may be devoted to research and writing. Active student interaction and participation is a strong expectation of this course. Currently, the intention is for this class to be taught face-to-face; adaptations may be made in light of changing conditions and university policies. Students are expected to follow safety protocols (i.e. wearing masks and respecting social distancing) during all face-to-face classes.
